actionCalls.description: ... evaluate if we should persist the B2C AuthToken properties -- and also evaluate if we should include the B2C AuthToken integration properties.
actionCalls.name: ia_persistAndAuditB2CAuthToken
actionCalls.label: Persist and Audit the B2C AuthToken

actionCalls.description: ... update the Salesforce Contact leveraging the data retrieved from B2C Commerce.
actionCalls.name: ia_processContactUpdateB2CProfile
actionCalls.label: Process Contact Update from B2C Commerce

actionCalls.description: ... takes the response provided by the publish event and updates the B2C Commerce profile accordingly.
actionCalls.name: ia_processPublishContactUpdateB2CProfile
actionCalls.label: Process Contact Update from B2C Commerce

actionCalls.description: ... take the specified Contact and publish field updates to B2C Commerce based on updatable field mappings created
actionCalls.name: ia_publishB2CCommerceProfileUpdates
actionCalls.label: Publish Updates to the B2C Commerce Profile

actionCalls.description: ... request a B2C AuthToken via the Account Manager configuration.
actionCalls.name: ia_requestB2CAuthToken
actionCalls.label: Request a B2C AuthToken

actionCalls.description: ... retrieve the B2C Commerce Customer Profile via the OCAPI REST API.
actionCalls.name: ia_retrieveB2CCommerceCustomerProfile
actionCalls.label: Retrieve the B2C Commerce Customer Profile

actionCalls.description: ... validates the integration configuration for the selected Contact and returns configuration properties that indicate if integration can continue for the configured processMode
actionCalls.name: ia_validateIntegrationConfiguration
actionCalls.label: Validate Integration Configuration

assignments.description: ... assign the B2C AuthToken to a local variable for future reference.
assignments.name: asn_b2cAuthToken
assignments.label: Assign the B2C AuthToken

assignments.description: ... assign the B2C AuthToken to a local variable for future reference.
assignments.name: asn_b2cAuthToken_0
assignments.label: Assign the B2C AuthToken

assignments.description: ... capture the retryCount from the AccountManager configuration settings.
assignments.name: asn_retryCount
assignments.label: Assign the RetryCount

decisions.description: ... evaluates if the B2C Commerce Customer Profile response should be audited.
decisions.name: dec_AuditB2CCustomerProfileRetrieveResponse
decisions.label: Audit the Details of the B2C Commerce Response

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the Contact update driven by the publish response should be audited.
decisions.name: dec_auditContactUpdateFromPublishResponse
decisions.label: Audit the Details of the Contact Update
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Do Not Audit the Contact Update

decisions.description: ... evaluate if B2C Commerce Customer Profile Details were successfully retrieved from the specified B2C Commerce Instance and CustomerList.
decisions.name: dec_B2CCustomerProfileDetailsRetrievedSuccessfully
decisions.label: Were B2C Customer Profile Details Successfully Retrieved

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the Contact has a parent Account; if not -- exit early (do not process the Contact update).
decisions.name: dec_doesContactHaveParentAccount
decisions.label: Does the Contact Have a Parent Account?

rules.name: decOut_ContactDoesNotHaveParentAccount
rules.label: Contact Does Not Have a Parent Account

decisions.description: ... evaluates if the Contact's fields that are mapped to B2C Customer Profile properties have been updated.
decisions.name: dec_hasB2CCommerceProfileBeenUpdated
decisions.label: Has the Update Been Published to the B2C Commerce Profile?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the retryCount has been exceeded during the retrieval of B2C AuthTokens via the Account Manager configuration.
decisions.name: dec_hasRetryCountBeenExceeded
decisions.label: Has the RetryCount Been Exceeded?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if authToken persistence is enabled -- and authTokens should be written to the Salesforce org.
decisions.name: dec_isAuthTokenPersistenceEnabled
decisions.label: Is AuthToken Persistence Enabled?

decisions.description: ... evaluates the integration configuration validation results -- and either moves forward with the integration event or stops event processing.
decisions.name: dec_isIntegrationEnabledForPlatformEvent
decisions.label: Is Integration Enabled for this Event?

decisions.description: ... validate the ProcessMode attached to the Platform Event.
decisions.name: dec_isProcessModeValid
decisions.label: Is ProcessMode Valid

decisions.description: ... evaluate the ProcessMode of the Platform Event to determine how to execute the event (either retrieving customerProfile details or publishing customerProfile details).
decisions.name: dec_RetrieveOrPublishB2CCustomerProfiles
decisions.label: Retrieve or Publish B2C Customer Profiles?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the specified Contact was retrieved successfully.
decisions.name: dec_verifyContactWasFound
decisions.label: Was the Contact Found?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a B2C AuthToken was retrieved via the Account Manager configuration.
decisions.name: dec_wasB2CAuthTokenRetrieved
decisions.label: Was a B2C AuthToken Retrieved?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the Contact was verified prior to auditing.
decisions.name: dec_wasContactVerified
decisions.label: Was the Contact Verified?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the Contact was verified prior to auditing.
decisions.name: dec_wasContactVerifiedPublish
decisions.label: Was the Contact Verified?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a valid B2C AuthToken was retrieved for the specified B2C Client ID.
decisions.name: dec_wasValidB2CAuthTokenFound
decisions.label: Was a Valid B2C AuthToken Found?

Flow.description: ... this flow is used to retrieve, process, and write B2C Commerce Customer Profile details retrieved via the B2C Commerce OCAPI REST API back to the mapped Salesforce Contact object managed by the Salesforce Platform.

formulas.description: ... represents the number of retries to support when requesting a B2C AuthToken.
formulas.name: RetryCountLimit

Flow.interviewLabel: B2C Commerce: Platform Event: Process Contact: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: B2C Commerce: Platform Event: Process Contact Update

recordCreates.description: ... audit the B2C Commerce Customer Profile integration results for the specific Contact record.
recordCreates.name: recCreate_B2CRetrieveContactIntegrationHistory
recordCreates.label: Audit the B2C Commerce Customer Profile

recordCreates.description: ... audit the B2C Commerce Customer Profile integration results for the specific Contact record.
recordCreates.name: recCreate_B2CRetrieveContactIntegrationHistoryFromPublish
recordCreates.label: Audit the B2C Commerce Customer Profile

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the Account Manager configuration associated to the configuration settings.
recordLookups.name: recGet_accountManagerConfig
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Account Manager Configuration

recordLookups.description: ... get the active configuration mapped to the default.
recordLookups.name: recGet_activeConfiguration
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Active Configuration

recordLookups.description: ... attempt to retrieve a B2C AuthToken for the associated B2C Client ID.
recordLookups.name: recGet_B2CAuthToken
recordLookups.label: Retrieve an Active B2C AuthToken

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the B2C Instance related to the attached B2C CustomerList
recordLookups.name: recGet_B2CInstance
recordLookups.label: Get the Related B2C Instance

recordLookups.description: ... retrieves the Contact Record to perform validation.
recordLookups.name: recGet_Contact
recordLookups.label: Get the Contact Record

recordLookups.description: ... validate that the Contact record exists prior to auditing.
recordLookups.name: recGet_contactValidatePublish
recordLookups.label: Validate the Contact Exists

recordLookups.description: ... validate that the Contact record exists prior to auditing.
recordLookups.name: recGet_contactValidateRetrieve
recordLookups.label: Validate the Contact Exists

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the default configuration for the application.
recordLookups.name: recGet_defaultConfiguration
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Default Configuration

variables.description: ... represents the incremental retryCount used to request B2C AuthTokens.
variables.name: authTokenRetryCount

variables.description: ... represents the retrieved / generated B2C AuthToken that will be used for future requests.
variables.name: B2CAuthToken

variables.description: ... transition variable representing the string version of the retryCount for B2C AuthToken requests.
variables.name: RetryCountPicklistValue

variables.description: ... represents the date / time that a contact was last modified taken from the post-publish process.
variables.name: varContactLastModifiedDatePostPublish

variables.description: ... represents if Contact creation is enabled within the integration configuration
variables.name: varIsContactCreationEnabled

variables.description: ... represents the last date / time that a Contact was updated resulting from a Contact Processing Platform Event.
variables.name: varLastContactUpdatedDate
